subtitle: Appointments that turn into deals
description: Get 16+ guaranteed meetings monthly with qualified, warmed-up leads.
secondarySubtitle: We`ve got you covered on each step of the process to bring you ready-to-buy leads.

cardItems.text: To make targeting precise, we review your ICP and analyze TAM to define whether there are matching decision-makers.
Our team searches for people to correspond with your criteria and filters out those without the potential to buy.
Finally, we segment the remaining leads and gather more details about them to be able to deliver custom messages.
Based on your ICP and research data, we develop outreach strategy and prepare templates of personalized emails.
At the same time, our tech experts configure and warm up mailboxes to make sure your emails are delivered and seen.
After launching the campaigns, we constantly monitor their vital metrics and adjust strategy if needed.
Designing and launching tailored campaigns.
At the same time, our tech experts configure and warm up mailboxes to make sure your emails are delivered and seen.
After launching the campaigns, we constantly monitor their vital metrics and adjust strategy if needed.
SDRs get in touch with the leads who respond to emails and suggest scheduling a call at your available time slots.
Before appointments, our sales people send gentle reminders to your leads about upcoming meetings.
In case of no-show, we follow up with this person to reschedule the meeting, as our goal is to bring you as many calls as possible.

subtitle: Engage. Build relationships. Win loyal clients.
description: We help you grow visibility and trust with your potential customers and strike right to their hearts to close deals.
secondarySubtitle: Outbound tactics that create demand? Sounds intriguing. Have a look at our workflow to leave no question unanswered.

cards.cardDescription: Shaping your TAM, ICP, and value prop

cardItems.text: First, we study your market, service or product, core pain points you address, and your distinctive features.
After that, we draft and approve your ICP if you don`t have one, or propose adjustments to the existing ICP to make our outreach super targeted.
We create several UVPs for the chosen client profiles. This helps us analyze the potential demand existing in your niche.

cards.cardDescription: Creating and testing tailored email campaigns

cardItems.text: Experienced writers craft several sequences of emails for each group of ICPs, addressing their pain points.
Our tech specialists take care of domain and mailbox configuration to prevent possible spam issues.
We launch email waves and monitor performance to understand which templates resonate and drive the highest results.

cards.cardDescription: Launching mass campaigns and booking appointments

cardItems.text: After the pilot campaigns are over, our SDRs provide you with a detailed report on prospects` engagement, basic KPIs of email outreach, and the most popular positive/negative replies.
Also, we analyze the acquired results, improve the pilot VP, and sharpen the ICPs if needed.
Finally, we initiate full-fledged lead research and outreach, filling your pipeline with appointments.

subtitle: Tailored outreach that turns 'No' into 'Yes'
description: Reach out to 100% of the lead list with hand-crafted, consistent email cadences.
secondarySubtitle: We`ve elaborated the result-oriented process based on team work. This is how it goes.

cards.cardDescription: Analyzing current situation and configuring infrastructure

cardItems.text: We study your history of outreach, database quality, email templates, and follow-up tactics to find points of improvement.
Our tech specialists examine your domain reputation and determine factors that affected it. They analyze domain zones risks and pick another domain if needed.
Finally, we set up DNS, create and warm up mailboxes.
Our writers take into account your ICP and prospects' pain points to craft tailored and catchy emails. They prepare the sequences that consist of 1 intro and at least 4 follow-ups.
Our SDRs fine-tune profiles for mailboxes and start sending bulk emails to the hand-picked leads on your behalf.
We track replies, send canned responses, and lead the prospects down the funnel to connect them with your sales team.

cards.cardDescription: Monitoring cadences performance and testing approaches

cardItems.text: When the campaigns are active, our delivery team tracks KPIs of each and reports on the results to you.
We also conduct A/B testing of templates and approaches to find those delivering the highest open and reply rates with further conversion into appointments.
Our tech experts also keep their finger on the pulse of the sequences and quickly eliminate spam issues.

subtitle: Reach and engage leads via LinkedIn
description: Unleash LinkedIn potential and close more deals by establishing your brand expertise and attracting quality leads from your company's or personal profile.
secondarySubtitle: Check out how we help you build meaningful relations with your audience until they become your clients.

cards.cardDescription: Establishing your expertise and increasing your audience

cardItems.text: Before starting looking for leads, we analyze and upgrade info on your LinkedIn profile to give it professional look and feel.
To help you get seen by potential clients, we study your specifics, develop sophisticated outreach strategy, publish posts on your behalf, and stimulate your followers to interact.
We monitor engagements, add those who reacted to posts to your pipeline, and continue nurturing them with relevant content.

cards.cardDescription: Engaging into meaningful conversations with your connections

cardItems.text: We define decision-makers who interact with your profile, qualify them, and send connection requests.
When they add you to their network, we drop them a short personalized welcome message and briefly describe your offer.
In case there's no response, we launch a sequence of messages to remind how you can help and book a call with them.
First, we research your TAM and competitors, as well as get acquainted with your ICP and their pain points to create a stellar content strategy and plan.
Our copywriters produce exclusive content that resonates with your audience and drives impressions, reactions, and reposts.
We track posts performance, and adjust the strategy to convert your followers into qualified leads, interested in your solutions.
